#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	string s;
	int v;

	cin >> s;
	v = ( s[ 0 ] - '0' ) * ( s[ 5 ] - '0' ) + ( s[ 1 ] - '0' ) * ( s[ 6 ] - '0' ) + ( s[ 2 ] - '0' ) * ( s[ 7 ] - '0' ) + ( s[ 3 ] - '0' ) * ( s[ 8 ] - '0' ) + ( s[ 4 ] - '0' ) * ( s[ 9 ] - '0' );
	
	printf("%d\n", v );

	return 0;
}
